elements.name: Verify API: getTaskCount API return Total Task Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getTaskCount"
User calls "getTaskCount" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify task_Count result is greater than 0

elements.name: Verify API: createTask API add Task paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" "Add" Task Payload
User calls "createTask" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify responseBody is instance of Task
Verify Total task_Count increased by 1
Verify taskId, taskequence, taskDisplaySequence is equal to total_task_count
Verify Task_Code is equal to 'TSK_task_count'

elements.name: Verify API: createTask API with no task Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Task Payload  with no Task Body and Param = "none"
User calls "createTask" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task com.ibm.dc.task.controller.TaskController.createTask(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task com.ibm.dc.task.controller.TaskController.createTask(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllTasks API return List of All Tasks

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllTasks"
User calls "getAllTasks" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
Total number of Tasks in List is equal to getTaskCount

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getTaskBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
All Tasks should have Active Status

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by 'taskId' & 'taskDescription' & 'taskApplicable' & 'taskStatus'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with Parameter: 'taskId' & 'taskDescription' & 'taskApplicable' & 'taskStatus'
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
Response should be List of Tasks and size should be one

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by 'taskId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "taskId"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
Response should be List of Tasks and size should be one

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by 'taskApplicable'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "taskApplicable"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
Each Task of returned TaskList should have same "taskApplicable"

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by 'taskDescription'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "taskDescription"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
Each Task of returned TaskList should have same "taskDescription"

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by 'taskStatus'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "taskStatus"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Tasks
Each Task of returned TaskList should have same "taskStatus"

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'taskId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with invalid Parameter: "taskId" = "-9"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Activities with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'taskDescription'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with invalid Parameter: "taskDescription" = "invalidDescriptionName"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Activities with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'taskApplicable'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with invalid Parameter: "taskApplicable" = "invalidTaskApplicable"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Activities with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'taskStatus'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getTaskBySearchCriteria with invalid Parameter: "taskStatus" = "invalidTaskStatus"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Activities with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: deleteTask update Task status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteTask with Parameter: "taskId"
User calls "deleteTask" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Task instance

elements.name: Verify API: deleteTask API,  with invalid taskId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteTask" with invalid Parameter: "taskId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteTask" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Task with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteTask API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User deleteTask with no Param
User calls "deleteTask" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'taskId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateTask API add Task paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" "Update" Task Payload with Param = "taskId"
User calls "updateTask" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify Task fields gets updated

elements.name: Verify API: updateTask API, with invalid taskId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Task Payload  with invalid Param = "taskId" and value="-9"
User calls "updateTask" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Task with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: updateTask API, with no taskId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Task Payload  with no Param
User calls "updateTask" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'taskId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateTask API, with no task Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Task Payload  with no Task Body and Param = "taskId"
User calls "updateTask" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task com.ibm.dc.task.controller.TaskController.updateTask(java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task com.ibm.dc.task.controller.TaskController.updateTask(java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,com.ibm.dc.task.entity.Task)"
